title: EastEnders spoilers: Panesar brothers' secret link to Walford exposed amid row with Ben
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

EastEnders spoilers have confirmed a return for the Panesar brothers next week, as they make their Walford arrival.

The brothers made their BBC soap debut when they got into a showdown with Ben Mitchell, also kidnapping Lola Pearce.

Ben had stolen Kheerat's expensive car, and the siblings wanted to show him who was boss leading to a dramatic feud.

The boys even threatened to harm Ben's young daughter Lexi, while Martin Fowler also found himself caught up in the drama after being blackmailed by Phil Mitchell's son.

(Image: BBC / Jack Barnes)

But it's not Ben they've come to see, leaving him pretty embarrassed when he confronts them.

Details are being kept under wraps as to why they are in Walford this time around.

But given the drama surrounding their first scenes, it's bound to cause some sort of chaos.

(Image: BBC / Kieron McCarron)

(Image: BBC)

During the week, Jags spots a familiar face in the Square revealing a link to the show.

But who does he recognise, and what does it mean for the brothers' future on the soap?

Later on in the week, Kheerat ends up embroiled in another showdown this time with recent newcomer Ash Kaur.

Keep up with all the soap news Life moves fast in soapland, so make sure you stay up to date with all the latest from your favourite soaps with our regular email newsletter. Sign up using this form to receive regular updates on Corrie, Emmerdale, EastEnders direct to your inbox. We'll also keep you up to date on what your favourite stars are up to in the real world too, and the breaking news as it happens.

(Image: BBC)

Iqra Ahmed's girlfriend clashes with Kheerat when their family history comes to light.

Viewers will have to tune in next week to find out how they are linked, and what it means for the brothers.

With the boys set to stick around too, will there be another clash with Ben and could the Mitchells be the family they're going to be at war with?

EastEnders airs Mondays and Fridays at 8pm, and Tuesdays and Thursdays at 7:30pm on BBC One.
description: The Panesar brothers arrive in Walford in next week's EastEnders, and they immediately clash with Ben Mitchell
